alert.note: Alert for Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of south central York and southeastern Strafford Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Berwick, or 8 miles northeast of Durham. This storm was moving east at 5 MPH. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kittery, Dover, Berwick, South Berwick, York, Wells, Eliot, Rollinsford, Ogunquit and North Berwick. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 2 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
